title: Perdition
description: Well...that could have gone better.Nothing Raptor ever taught me prepared me for what’s next. Neither did my state's public education system, or the history of history.An ancient evil plans to destroy my city, and all I have managed to do is slow them down, a little. For the last month I’ve been running as hard as I can, but I’m always just one day away from the apocalypse, one minute from my last, and a second ahead of the next guy trying to kill me.And I just ran out of time.
author: Arthur Mayor
